page.title: 04THE SILVERSMITH __continued.
page.content: she heated it, it would melt at a different temperature from the sterling silver and pieces could be joined. Sometimes people ask her to repair rings, to put the claws back so that the stones will not fall out. She showed us some of the tools she uses to take the dents out of silver articles.These are stakes, and she would use a round stake for a round shape, like a dish. All her tools were hanging around the walls, such as hammers and mallets of different sizes. There were pliers hanging up and a dentist's drill to brush the silver or to remove lettering from old pieces of silver. She uses a band saw for cutting the sheets of silver. She buys silver wire, for ear_rings and bracelets, that is already patterned, and also silver tubing and chains. The jewellery she makes are ear_rings,
